name: Curse of the Nurse
description:
You have been hired at Chaos Hospital as a Nurse. Due to your inexperience, you have been stuck on clean up duty. Enjoy your shift, it will never end.

The rising demand in patients means you will have to keep up with the cleanliness standards for the Hospital. Don't let the trash pile up too much or you will be fired!

Controls:

Arrow Keys:

Left/Right = Move

Up/Down = Throw Trash in Garbage (only while near garbage can)

Up= Grab Mop (only while near mop bucket)

Down= Return Mop (only while near mop bucket)

Instructions:

Collect trash by walking under it as it falls. Throw the trash in the garbage to make room in your inventory. Use the mop to clean up any trash that has landed on the floor. Get as high of a score as you can, there is no winning.

This game is cursed. There is no way to mute the music. Enjoy the pain and suffering.
